turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need you to order a coffee for me at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great. At which location will you be picking up your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Coleman in Mount Pleasant, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What would you like me to order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti Pike Place and a plain toasted bagel with cream cheese, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, let me see if I've got that - you want a venti Pike Place, and a plain toasted bagel with cream cheese?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, would you like anything in your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want half and half, and one sugar please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it. Do you want to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, get me a Teavana Pineapple Berry too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, got it. Do you want to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that should cover it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just to review: You ordered a venti Pike Place with half and half and one sugar; a plain toasted bagel with cream cheese; and a Teavana Pinapple Berry iced tea drink. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I'm placing your order now. Your order has been placed at the Starbucks Coleman Avenue location in Mt. Pleasant. Your order will be ready for pickup in ten minutes. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's everything for now, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great. I'm forwarding your receipt via text message. Will there be anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. Goodbye.

items.name: Teavana Pinapple Berry iced tea drink
